```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>", 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE
)

library(eprgraf)

```

Epigraf expects data in a format called Relational Article Model (RAM).


## Map data to the RAM

```{r}

ds <- tribble(
  ~case, ~title, ~text,
  1, "Case 01", "Happy New Year!",
  2, "Case 02", "Happy Easter!",
  3, "Case 03", "Happy Birthday!"
)

epi <- ds |> 
  df_to_ram(
    item    = c("content" = "text"),
    article = c("id" = "case", "signature" = "case", "name" = "title"),
    compile = T
  )

```

## Upload data


```{r}
api_setup("https://epigraf.inschriften.net/", "MYACCESSTOKEN")
api_patch(epi, "epi_example")
```
